channel.title: Txt4 = "_____" Doesn't work?
channel.description: I use project czar source and my codes for txt4 = "_____" doesn't work. It is supposed to make the character themselves say it. It isn't working. Any help?

item.title: Txt4 = "_____" Doesn't work?
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[quote=“zubmage, post:7, topic:193866”]This is one of mine:

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14074) { //attack stillgfx(346, absY, absX); stillgfx(427, absY, absX); stillgfx(83, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Attack!."; string4UpdateRequired = true; }

And it doesn’t work, unless I attack something then the text appears.[/quote]

now you say when wear cape -> keep doing action so he will keep talking

add option operate to your cape

see wich case it use end add the code into the case so when you use operate you talk

Read full topic

item.title: Txt4 = "_____" Doesn't work?
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

public void pSay(String whatToSay) { txt4 = ""+whatToSay; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; string4UpdateRequired = true; }

if you want to let them say something like when you click on emote tab do it like

case ####:
txt4 = “hello”
break;
